title: NEGATIVITY IS RIOT'S FAULT
body:
BECAUSE RIOT GIVES VERY BAD TEAMMATES AND MAKES GOOD PLAYERS FOR THE SHITTY PLAYS OF FUCKING SCRUBS.
IT'S ONLY NORMAL TO TRASH TALK AND INSULT PEOPLE WHO WASTE YOUR TIME SO....
RIOT IS ENTIRELY RESPONSIBLE FOR "NEGATIVITY", "TOXICITY" WHATEVER OTHER SHIT THEY PUT UP.
